QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint) as medrec_key, pat.pat_key, payor.std_payor_desc from {sc}.payor join {sc}.pat on pat.std_payor = payor.std_payor JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND pat.medrec_key = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(pat.medrec_key as bigint)
